channel.title: [PI] What files to change these names
channel.description: Okay so when you click logout it says "do you want to logout of 'servername' " How can i change that server name with my server name..like what file? Also it says at the bank..."The bank of runescape" How can i change that to say the bank of my server name?

item.title: [PI] What files to change these names
item.dc:creator: @Tehlife Tehlife
item.description:
@Tehlife wrote:

You need to download Lins Rs Interface editor here it is: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=427639.0
Then you open it and load your cache. Press Interface -> Select and type in the interface for that you need to change the RuneScape.
Example dueling interface is 6575 if you would wanna change it you would type 6575 in.
Ok so let’s take the dueling interface for example. So i would wanna change the text: Your stake -> My stake
So know I would press the + so it were it says Interface 6575 so it turns to a - and you will see alot of letters coming down from it.
Then you just test pressing it until you find the text.
Ok so I found out the text id of Your stake is 6671. Know I press on it and then you see were the box under where the layers are it says the coulor and size and text.
You find one who says Disabledtext. There take out the Your stake and write instead My stake.
Know you go File -> Export Interface File and safe as for example: Dueling edit, and safe it in your cache location.

Next step is download Tom’s Cache Suit here: http://uppit.com/v/GVBQ3AAR
Open it and load your cache.
Know click Edit Jagex Archives.
Select there interface.jag
Know select data and replace it with the file you made in Lins Interface editor.
Then click Repack archive and check if worked.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] What files to change these names

item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:6, topic:375630”][quote author=rash link=topic=471564.msg3449035#msg3449035 date=1293609374]

u can edit it from the cache

Why would you edit the cache to change the servername?

Config class, i believe

and client sided, rsinterface, or something like that

wtf why wouldn’t you that’s how its supposed to be done

To change text in your server, you edit your cache?
[/quote]why are you making it sound so difficult?[/quote]
Im not, its just a have changed the name of my server without editing the cache, was wondering what you talking about
